red tape.translation[0].definitions[0].d: official rules that seem unnecessary and prevent things from being done quickly and easily
red tape.translation[0].definitions[0].e: a procedure surrounded by bureaucracy and red tape
The new rules should help cut the red tape for farmers.
red tape.translation[1].definitions[0].d: official rules that seem complicated and unnecessary and prevent things from being done quickly and easily
red tape.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The only way to get this project off the ground is to cut through the red tape.
Planning permission is tied up in red tape.
